query.name: Запрос 1
query.body:
select PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode, pf.ZoneCode, COUNT(*) from fct.PdfFiles PF inner join fct.PressPre PP ON PF.SubjectCode = PP.SubjectCode AND PF.ExamDate = PP.ExamDate AND pf.ZoneCode = PP.ZoneCode AND pf.Pdfname = PP.Pdfname AND pf.RowNumber = PP.PdfNumber inner join fct.LoadFile LF ON pp.LoadFileID = LF.LoadFileID where Pf.ExamDate > '$ExamDate$' and LF.LoadDate > '$LoadDate$' --and LF.LoadDate > '2015-04-27 19:00:00.000' --and pp.regioncode <> 90 --Pf.ExamDate = '2015.05.28' --and LF.LoadDate > '2015-04-15 00:00:00.000' --and pp.regioncode <> 90 --and pp.regioncode in (86,49,83,38) --and Pf.ExamDate in ('2015.06.26') --and pf.SubjectCode in (29,30, 31,33) --and pf.ZoneCode = 0
group by PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode,pf.ZoneCode order by PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode, pf.ZoneCode

query.name: Запрос 2
query.body: select pp.regioncode, PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode,pf.ZoneCode, pf.variantcode, COUNT(*) from fct.PdfFiles PF inner join fct.pressPre PP ON PF.SubjectCode = PP.SubjectCode AND PF.ExamDate = PP.ExamDate AND pf.ZoneCode = PP.ZoneCode AND pf.Pdfname = PP.Pdfname AND pf.RowNumber = PP.PdfNumber where Pf.ExamDate > '$ExamDate$' --and Pf.SubjectCode = $SubjectCode$ --and pp.regioncode = 90 and PF.SubjectCode = 1 group by pp.regioncode,PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode,pf.ZoneCode, pf.variantcode order by pp.regioncode,PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode,pf.ZoneCode, pf.variantcode

query.name: Запрос 3
query.body: select PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode, pf.ZoneCode, COUNT(*) from fct.PdfFiles PF inner join fct.PressKims PP ON PF.SubjectCode = PP.SubjectCode AND PF.ExamDate = PP.ExamDate AND pf.ZoneCode = PP.ZoneCode AND pf.Pdfname = PP.Pdfname AND pf.RowNumber = PP.PdfNumber inner join fct.LoadFile LF ON pp.LoadFileID = LF.LoadFileID inner join fct.PressPacks PPs ON pp.PackNumber = PPs.PackNumber inner join fct.PressBoxs PB ON PPs.BoxNumber = PB.BoxNumber where Pf.ExamDate > '$ExamDate$' and LF.LoadDate > '$LoadDate$' --and PF.SubjectCode = 22 --and pp.Pdfname like '%p_ZOU.%' --and PB.RegionCode = 90 group by PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode,pf.ZoneCode order by PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode, pf.ZoneCode

query.name: Запрос 4
query.body:
select PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode,pf.ZoneCode, pf.variantcode, COUNT(*) from fct.PdfFiles PF inner join fct.PressKims PP ON PF.SubjectCode = PP.SubjectCode AND PF.ExamDate = PP.ExamDate AND pf.ZoneCode = PP.ZoneCode AND pf.Pdfname = PP.Pdfname AND pf.RowNumber = PP.PdfNumber inner join fct.LoadFile LF ON pp.LoadFileID = LF.LoadFileID
where Pf.ExamDate > '$ExamDate$' and LF.LoadDate > '$LoadDate$' and pp.SubjectCode = $SubjectCode$ group by PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode,pf.ZoneCode, pf.variantcode order by PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode,pf.ZoneCode, pf.variantcode

query.name: Запрос 5
query.body: SELECT examdate, COUNT(*) FROM fct.PressPre PP WHERE PP.ExamDate > '$ExamDate$' group by examdate order by examdate

query.name: Запрос 6
query.body: SELECT examdate,subjectcode, COUNT(*) FROM fct.PressPre PP WHERE PP.ExamDate > '$ExamDate$' group by examdate, subjectcode order by examdate, subjectcode

query.name: Запрос 7
query.body: select PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode,pf.ZoneCode, pf.variantcode, COUNT(*) from fct.PdfFiles PF inner join fct.pressPre PP ON PF.SubjectCode = PP.SubjectCode AND PF.ExamDate = PP.ExamDate AND pf.ZoneCode = PP.ZoneCode AND pf.PdfName = PP.PdfName AND pf.RowNumber = PP.PdfNumber where Pf.ExamDate > '$ExamDate$' and Pf.SubjectCode = $SubjectCode$ group by PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode,pf.ZoneCode, pf.variantcode order by PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode,pf.ZoneCode, pf.variantcode

query.name: Запрос 8
query.body: select pp.regioncode, PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode,pf.ZoneCode, pf.variantcode, COUNT(*) from fct.PdfFiles PF inner join fct.pressPre PP ON PF.SubjectCode = PP.SubjectCode AND PF.ExamDate = PP.ExamDate AND pf.ZoneCode = PP.ZoneCode AND pf.PdfName = PP.PdfName AND pf.RowNumber = PP.PdfNumber where Pf.ExamDate > '$ExamDate$' --and Pf.SubjectCode = $SubjectCode$ group by pp.regioncode,PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode,pf.ZoneCode, pf.variantcode order by pp.regioncode,PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode,pf.ZoneCode, pf.variantcode

query.name: Запрос 9
query.body: select PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode, pf.ZoneCode, COUNT(*) from fct.PdfFiles PF inner join fct.pressPre PP ON PF.SubjectCode = PP.SubjectCode AND PF.ExamDate = PP.ExamDate AND pf.ZoneCode = PP.ZoneCode AND pf.PdfName = PP.PdfName AND pf.RowNumber = PP.PdfNumber where Pf.ExamDate > '$ExamDate$' group by PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode,pf.ZoneCode order by PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode, pf.ZoneCode

query.name: Запрос 10
query.body: select pp.regioncode, PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode,pf.ZoneCode, pf.variantcode, COUNT(*) from fct.PdfFiles PF inner join fct.pressPre PP ON PF.SubjectCode = PP.SubjectCode AND PF.ExamDate = PP.ExamDate AND pf.ZoneCode = PP.ZoneCode AND pf.PdfName = PP.PdfName AND pf.RowNumber = PP.PdfNumber inner join fct.LoadFile LF ON pp.LoadFileID = LF.LoadFileID where Pf.ExamDate > '$ExamDate$' and LF.LoadDate > '$LoadDate$' group by pp.regioncode,PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode,pf.ZoneCode, pf.variantcode order by pp.regioncode,PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode,pf.ZoneCode, pf.variantcode

query.name: Запрос 11
query.body: select PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode, pf.ZoneCode, COUNT(*) from fct.PdfFiles PF inner join fct.pressPre PP ON PF.SubjectCode = PP.SubjectCode AND PF.ExamDate = PP.ExamDate AND pf.ZoneCode = PP.ZoneCode AND pf.PdfName = PP.PdfName AND pf.RowNumber = PP.PdfNumber inner join fct.LoadFile LF ON pp.LoadFileID = LF.LoadFileID where Pf.ExamDate > '$ExamDate$'and LF.LoadDate < '$LoadDate$' group by PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode,pf.ZoneCode order by PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode, pf.ZoneCode

query.name: Запрос 12
query.body:
select PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode,pf.ZoneCode, pf.variantcode, COUNT(*) from fct.PdfFiles PF inner join fct.pressPre PP ON PF.SubjectCode = PP.SubjectCode AND PF.ExamDate = PP.ExamDate AND pf.ZoneCode = PP.ZoneCode AND pf.PdfName = PP.PdfName AND pf.RowNumber = PP.PdfNumber inner join fct.LoadFile LF ON pp.LoadFileID = LF.LoadFileID
where Pf.ExamDate > '$ExamDate$' and LF.LoadDate > '$LoadDate$' group by PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode,pf.ZoneCode, pf.variantcode order by PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode,pf.ZoneCode, pf.variantcode

query.name: Запрос 13
query.body: select CAST(R.Region AS varchar) + ' - ' + R.RegionName , PF.ExamDate, CAST(S.SubjectCode AS varchar) + ' - ' + S.SubjectName,pf.ZoneCode from fct.PdfFiles PF inner join fct.pressPre PP ON PF.SubjectCode = PP.SubjectCode AND PF.ExamDate = PP.ExamDate AND pf.ZoneCode = PP.ZoneCode AND pf.PdfName = PP.PdfName AND pf.RowNumber = PP.PdfNumber inner join fct.LoadFile LF ON pp.LoadFileID = LF.LoadFileID inner join rbdc_Regions R ON pp.regioncode = R.REGION inner join sc_Subjects S ON pp.SubjectCode = S.SubjectCode where Pf.ExamDate > '$ExamDate$' and LF.LoadDate < '$LoadDate$' group by pp.regioncode,CAST(R.Region AS varchar) + ' - ' + R.RegionName,PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode , CAST(S.SubjectCode AS varchar) + ' - ' + S.SubjectName,pf.ZoneCode order by pp.regioncode, CAST(R.Region AS varchar) + ' - ' + R.RegionName,PF.ExamDate,PF.SubjectCode,pf.ZoneCode
